thread.title: From hearings to hammers — and scaffolding
thread.title_full: From hearings to hammers — and scaffolding

author: Brian Johnson
title: From hearings to hammers — and scaffolding
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / From hearings to hammers — and scaffolding A worker descends scaffolding on the first level of the State Capitol in St. Paul. The $307 million Capitol renovation is picking up speed now that the legislative session is over. (Staff photo: Bill Klotz) From hearings to hammers — and scaffolding By: Brian Johnson July 11, 2015 7:05 am 0 The Capitol renovation picks up now that legislators have departed.
